content.rendered:
BEST BEAUTY PRODUCTS TO TRY NOW

Featuring best beauty products to try now that I personally use and love. Up your beauty game with these top cult following products.

Dr. Barbara Sturm Lifting Serum has a celebrity and influencer cult following.

The Lifting Serum contains ingredients that provide an instant beautifying, lifting effect to the skin. A variety of Biopolymers act like a matrix that provides firmness and elasticity, improving the skin’s surface texture and reducing the appearance of fine lines, resulting in a smoother complexion. In addition, a special extract derived from Plankton plumps out wrinkles while also supporting overall skin health and increasing firmness.

Hanacure face mask has also a crazy cult following and people rave about their results. It’s a must try at least once especially with its lifting and face smoothing power.

Other amazing products that people can’t get enough of is the BYREDO Mojave Ghost perfume, candles, and hand lotions.

Chanel Le Lift Creme restoring hand cream that comes in this beautiful futuristic shape to fit perfectly in your bag.

D’Lashes new beauty products like our popular D’Wispy lashes and our new lash wash. Don’t forget to pamper yourself by stocking up with our D’Lashes candles.

Kiehl’s ultimate strength hand cream is a must. Not only does it deeply moisturizes your hands it keeps your nails from splitting. Pro tip… you can use it under your eyes for the ultimate hydration and plumping action. They just came out with an extra large tube!

Olaplex hair strengthener has been the best for a while now and their product line just keeps on growing. This is a hair mask/treatment that helps strengthen your hair and keeps it from breaking especially if you color your hair. The only thing I don’t recommend is their hair oil if you have thin hair. After a month of use the hair oil make thin hair like velcro. But all their hair masks/treatments are amazing at keeping hair looking and feeling healthy and strong.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love!
